meanings.definition: A house or building where people live.
meanings.sent1: Many families have casas with beautiful gardens.
meanings.sent2: The casas in this neighborhood are painted in bright colors.
meanings.sent3: The casa was so small, it felt like a cozy little nest.
meanings.sent4: Her casa was a fortress of solitude, protecting her from the outside world.
meanings.sent5: The old casa creaked and groaned in the wind, telling stories of years gone by.

meanings.sent1: We visited several casas during our trip to Mexico.
meanings.sent2: The casas of the village were all made of adobe.
meanings.sent3: The casas stood in a row, looking like colorful blocks.
meanings.sent4: The casas dotted the landscape like tiny dots on a canvas.
meanings.sent5: In the distance, the casas shimmered in the heat of the desert sun.
